程序包 org.texttechnology.parliament_browser_6_4.controller

类 MeetingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.texttechnology.parliament_browser_6_4.controller.MeetingController
  • public class MeetingController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for initializing the page and setting up web routes for handling HTTP requests. It utilizes the Freemarker template engine for rendering views. The class collaborates with InsightFactory for accessing and manipulating insight data, UserDAO for user-related data access, and Freemarker's Configuration for configuring template engine settings. The routes include the application's home page, user center redirection based on user type, a route for handling "data not found" errors, and a redirection to the Swagger API documentation.
    作者:
    Yu Ming, He Liu

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MeetingController

        public MeetingController​(InsightFactory insightFactory,
                         UserDAO userDAO,
                         freemarker.template.Configuration cfg)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a MeetingController with specified InsightFactory, UserDAO, and Configuration. This constructor also initializes web routes for handling HTTP requests.
        参数:
        insightFactory - the InsightFactory instance used for data manipulation and access
        userDAO - the UserDAO instance used for accessing user data
        cfg - the Configuration instance used for template engine settings
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an input or output exception occurs
